sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app id="inspire">
    <v-navigation-drawer v-model="drawer">
      <!--  -->
    </v-navigation-drawer>

    <v-app-bar>
      <v-app-bar-nav-icon @click="drawer = !drawer"></v-app-bar-nav-icon>

      <v-app-bar-title>Register Grades</v-app-bar-title>
    </v-app-bar>

    <v-main>
      <v-sheet class="mx-auto" width="300">
        <v-form ref="form">
          <v-text-field v-model="completeName" :rules="completeNameRules" label="Complete name"></v-text-field>
          <v-text-field v-model="grade1" :rules="gradeValidation(1)" label="Grade 1"></v-text-field>
          <v-text-field v-model="grade2" :rules="gradeValidation(2)" label="Grade 2"></v-text-field>
          <v-text-field v-model="grade3" :rules="gradeValidation(3)" label="Grade 3"></v-text-field>
          <v-text-field v-model="grade4" :rules="gradeValidation(4)" label="Grade 4"></v-text-field>
          <v-btn class="mt-2" block @click="submit">Submit</v-btn>
        </v-form>
      </v-sheet>
    </v-main>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script setup>
  import { ref } from 'vue'
  import { useField, useForm} from 'vee-validate'


  const { handleSubmit, handleReset } = useForm({
    validationSchema: {
      fullName(value) {
        if(value) return true
        return 'You must enter a name'
      },

      grade1(value){
        if(value && !isNaN(value) && value >= 0 && value <= 10) return true
        return 'Grade 1 must be a number between 0 and 10'
      }
    }
  })

  const drawer = ref(null)
  const fullName = useField('name')
  const grade1 = useField('grade1')
  const grade2 = useField('grade2')
  const grade3 = useField('grade3')
  const grade4 = useField('grade4')

  function gradeValidation(gradeNumber){
     return[
          value => !!value || `You must enter a grade ${gradeNumber}`,
          value => (value && !isNaN(value) && value >= 0 && value <= 10) || `Grade ${gradeNumber} must be a number between 0 and 10`, 
        ]
  }

  function submit(){
    event.preventDefault()

    if(form.value){
      form.value.validate().then(success => {
        if(success){
          alert(`Form submited successfully!`)

          form.value.reset()
        }
      })
    }
  }

</script>
